name: Shattered (itch) (CarterLeBlanc, Darksword4)
description:
Shattered

Created during a 48 hour virtual game jam by a group of three programmers and an artist. Shattered is a series of minigames in which you regain your pieces by playing through tasks that are usually performed by knives. Once you regain all of your pieces the game is through.

Team

Programmers:

  • Carter LeBlanc
  • Seth Sylvester
  • Hunter Trahan

Artists:

  • Michael Jenkins
